comments.content:
Does anyone know what font this is. I saw it in a recent print issue of Fast Company.  
Don

Confirming Kaiser, bespoke typeface by Christian Schwartz and exclusive for Fast Company. More about this custom at [Commercial Type](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221015931/http:/commercialtype.com/news/updates/kaiser_and_zizou_for_ifast_company) "now available for licensing via Village, under the new and improved name of [Kommissar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221015931/http:/vllg.com/schwartzco/kommissar). "
